pages.text: To make your own lead flinger: You will need at the very least three things; an Action, a Receiver, and a Barrel. You can construct them out of any valid material, and any of the variants will work. Afterwards, put all 3 in a crafting interface and obtain your result!

After making a gun, parts can easily be swapped for new ones, or new parts added, by simply crafting the weapon with the part. The old part will pop out for re-use or disposal later. Note that parts can't [yet] be outright removed. Non-Essential parts are magazines,sights, and stocks; but all are generally just stat boosts.
